subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods, playing with Phil Mickelson and Bubba Watson, showed who was in charge with a one-under par 69 in the featured pairing of the first round of the United States Open.
snippet: Tiger Woods, playing with Phil Mickelson and Bubba Watson, showed who was in charge with a one-under par 69 in the featured pairing of the first round of the United States Open.
